title: Heart of the Wild
description: Kasie Moore had run from a planned marriage 8 years ago. Now kidnapped by her father's choice of husbands she must battle old hurts. The blizzard is doing nothing to keep her hidden passions intact. Seeking to keep her heart and regain her freedom she must fight Chayton's attraction. Chayton might have agreed to the kidnapping, but would he be able to prevent his heart from falling in love with hers? Would he capture her heart as surely as she had years ago?
author: Rita Hestand
